definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Equilibrium is the product of an axiomatic system.
sentences.chinese: 均衡观念是公理系统的产物。

sentences.english: The definition of the pre-R0 separation axiom was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 定义了不分明拓扑空间的拟R0分离公理。

sentences.english: Hume referred to the latter type of axioms as "self-evident" truths.
sentences.chinese: 休谟提到的“不言自明的”真理公理后一种类型。

sentences.english: As I mentioned before, proofs use axioms and theorems to make their case.
sentences.chinese: 如前所述，证明以公理和定理做为其论据。

sentences.english: This is an combined inference derived from Axiom of Physics and observation of CMBR.
sentences.chinese: 这是基于宇宙微波背景辐射和物理学公理的联合推论。

sentences.english: Finally, a set of axioms is co…
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了正负域运算的公理化定义。

sentences.english: The paper gave two basic principle of axiomatic design theory.
sentences.chinese: 同时给出了公理设计理论的两个基本公理。

sentences.english: The paper gave two basic principle of axiomatic design theory.
sentences.chinese: 同时给出了公理设计理论的两个基本公理。

sentences.english: The conception and theorem of fuzzy embedded multivalued dependency are also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了模糊嵌入多值依赖的概念及公理系统。

sentences.english: One of the least frequent is the congregational form so familiar in the West.
sentences.chinese: 其中最频繁的是公理的形式非常熟悉在西方。

sentences.english: Axiomatization of economic theory has many obvious advantage.
sentences.chinese: 经济理论的公理化有很多明显的优越性。

sentences.english: We cannot equate might with right.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能把强权视为公理。

sentences.english: West chicken for south can be in charge of axiom and proud.
sentences.chinese: 西凤却为向南能掌管公理而倍感骄傲。

sentences.english: There are contradictions in current theories of real number and ZFC.
sentences.chinese: 现行实数理论与ZFC公理集合论中都有矛盾。

sentences.english: The "sex is bad" axiom predominates in society and science.
sentences.chinese: “性是坏的”这个公理在社会和科学中占据了主导。

sentences.english: Even if there are universal principles, they're interpreted and mediated by people's experience.
sentences.chinese: 即使是一条公理，他们也要由人们的实践来张梦。

definition: Heaven's law/the natural order of things
innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
postulate (math.)/public facilities (abbr. for 公共設施|公共设施[gong1 gong4 she4 shi1])
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
